I feel much better! Good documentary!! {'Content advisory': ['Violence', 'substance use', 'alcohol use', 'foul language', 'sexual content'], 'Audio languages': ['English'], 'Subtitles': ['English [CC]'], 'Directors': ['Dean Parisot'], 'Producers': ['Mark Johnson', 'Barry Levinson', 'Lawrence Kasdan', 'Charles Newirth'], 'Starring': ['Drew Barrymore', "Catherine O'Hara", 'Luke Wilson'], 'Studio': ['WARNER BROS.']} Good cast and nice movies -) Very strange yet funny movie -)) {'Audio languages': ['English'], 'Subtitles': ['English [CC]'], 'Directors': ['Joel Schumacher'], 'Producers': ['Gil Netter', 'David Zucker', 'Ted Kurdyla'], 'Starring': ['Colin Farrell', 'Forest Whitaker', 'Katie Holmes']} Its ok Not bad, but not the best movie {'Content advisory': ['Nudity', 'violence', 'alcohol use', 'foul language', 'sexual content'], 'Audio languages': ['English Dialogue Boost: High', 'English', 'English [Audio Description]', 'English Dialogue Boost: Medium'], 'Subtitles': ['English [CC]'], 'Directors': ['Cameron Crowen'], 'Producers': ['Tom Cruise', 'Paula Wagner', 'Cameron Crowe', 'Jonathan Sanger', 'Danny Bramson', 'Bill Block', 'Fernando Bovaira', 'Patrick Wachsberger'], 'Starring': ['Tom Cruise', 'Penelope Cruz', 'Kurt Russell'], 'Studio': ['Paramount']} Boringgggggggg
Tom Cruse is a really bad actor -))) Very slow and boring.... {'Content advisory': ['Alcohol use', 'smoking', 'foul language', 'sexual content'], 'Audio languages': ['English', 'Deutsch'], 'Subtitles': ['English [CC]'], 'Directors': ['Robert Pulcini'], 'Producers': ['Richard Gladstein'], 'Starring': ['Scarlett Johansson', 'Laura Linney', 'Alicia Keys'], 'Studio': ['Lions Gate Films', 'Inc.']} This movie is exactly how life is behind the closed doors of rich families in NYC...
I was AuPair (foreign nanny) for over a year and this movie was like 90% of my life 10 year ago... I also had a boy and he was 7 y old...and we had a peanut butter from the jar (only no double dipping lol)
I also was fired because my "host mom" became jealous of kid's love towards me...He started to call me my mommy and the best friend. I tried to explain him the difference, BUT he said..mommy is who takes care of you and loves you, and you the only person who is....
I guess nothing else to add....Nanny cam and I was fired...
So many similarities in a movie...omg...
Anyway, the best part is I met my hubby. He also lived almost "next door"..and "my host mom" did not like our relationship, saying he is out of my class....
Now I am happily married for almost 8 years and became a doctor. Still live in NY next door to my EX-"host mom" -)))) Exactly how life is behind closed doors of rich families in NYC Angelina Ballerina - The Lucky Penny Finty Williams (Actor), Judi Dench (Actor), Kitty Taylor (Director), Roger McIntosh (Director) & 1 more Rated: Unrated Format: DVD Movies & TV, Studio Specials, Universal Studios Home Entertainment, All Universal Studios Titles ['When Angelina finds a lucky penny, she decides she doesn\x92t need to practice for an important audition. But when she loses the penny, she realizes that practice makes perfect after all. With Angelina\x92s support, Alice enters a gymnastics championship and learns to persevere as she overcomes her fear of the balance beam. Angelina also lends a helping hand to her new friend, Anya, a harvest mouse who is down on her luck, and to her grandpa as she searches for his lost war medal. It\x92s a lucky day for everyone in Angelina Ballerina: The Lucky Penny!'] {'Genre': 'Kids & Family, Music Videos & Concerts', 'Format': 'Multiple Formats, Animated, Closed-captioned, Color, NTSC', 'Contributor': 'Finty Williams, Lucy Raby, Kitty Taylor, Paul Larson, Katharine Holabird, Jo Wyatt, Judi Dench, Keith Wickham, Roger McIntoshFinty Williams, Lucy Raby, Kitty Taylor, Paul Larson, Katharine Holabird, Jo Wyatt, Judi Dench, Keith Wickham, Roger McIntosh See more', 'Language': 'English', 'Number Of Discs': '1', 'Aspect Ratio': '1.78:1', 'MPAA rating': 'Unrated (Not Rated)', 'Product Dimensions': '7.5 x 5.5 x 0.75 inches; 4.48 Ounces', 'Director': 'Kitty Taylor, Roger McIntosh', 'Media Format': 'Multiple Formats, Animated, Closed-captioned, Color, NTSC', 'Run time': '55 minutes', 'Release date': 'April 15, 2003', 'Actors': 'Finty Williams, Judi Dench, Keith Wickham, Jo Wyatt', 'Studio': 'Universal Studios Home Entertainment', 'Writers': 'Katharine Holabird, Lucy Raby, Paul Larson', 'Number of discs': '1'} Very cute for 3 y old baby. profile:
**User Summary:**

- **Content Preference:** The user continues to focus on engaging content about food and agriculture, emphasizing support for local farmers, health, and sustainable living. Their purchase of a juicer and interest in documentaries reinforce this commitment, although their tolerance for content has shown some variance as they explore other genres.

- **Rating Behavior:** Following a recent 5.0 rating for a relatable film, their average rating now stands at 4.5. However, their critical approach remains evident with a recent 1.0 rating for a season of a reality show they found staged and unentertaining, indicating a strong preference for authenticity and quality. This contrasts sharply with past positive ratings for quirky content, highlighting their discerning taste.

- **Language & Accessibility:** The user prefers English language options and values accessibility features, such as audio descriptions and closed captions.

- **Interest in Documentaries:** Their focus on social and ecological themes in documentaries remains strong, alongside interests in health and sustainability.

- **Producers and Directors:** They favor reputable producers and directors while remaining critical of low-quality content.

- **Social Responsibility:** Their commitment to social responsibility emphasizes support for local communities and thoughtful evaluation of content.

Overall, the user enjoys high-quality, relatable content that aligns with their passions while showcasing an evolving rating approach shaped by diverse viewing experiences. Their recent critical evaluation reflects a refined taste in entertainment, maintaining an appreciation for content that connects with their values.
